description: App(Deployment) 단위의 메트릭을 정리해서 보여주는 대시보드입니다.

targets.expr: sum by (namespace, pod, workload) (namespace_workload_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate5m{namespace="$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left(workload) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}) unless on(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", phase="Running"} @ end() == 1)

sum by (namespace, pod, workload) (namespace_workload_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate5m{namespace="$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left(workload) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}) and on(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", phase="Running"} @ end() == 1)
scalar(max(kube_resourcequota{namespace="$namespace", type="hard",resource="requests.cpu"}))
scalar(max(kube_resourcequota{namespace="$namespace", type="hard",resource="limits.cpu"}))

sum by (workload) (namespace_workload_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate5m{namespace="$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left(workload) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"})
sum by (pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate5m{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h]))
sum by (pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h]))

sum by (pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate5m{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h])) / sum by (pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h]))
sum by (pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h]))

sum by (pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate5m{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h])) / sum by (pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h]))
kube_pod_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", phase="Running"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left(workload) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}
count by(namespace, pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h]))
kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left(workload) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}

sum by (namespace, pod, workload) (namespace_workload_pod_container:container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left(workload) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}) unless on(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", phase="Running"} @ end() == 1)

sum by (namespace, pod, workload) (namespace_workload_pod_container:container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left(workload) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}) and on(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", phase="Running"} @ end() == 1)
scalar(max(kube_resourcequota{namespace="$namespace", type="hard",resource="requests.memory"}))
scalar(max(kube_resourcequota{namespace="$namespace", type="hard",resource="limits.memory"}))

sum by (workload) (namespace_workload_pod_container:container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left(workload) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"})
sum by (pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h]))
sum by (pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h]))

sum by (pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h])) / sum by (pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h]))
sum by (pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h]))

sum by (pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h])) / sum by (pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h]))
sum by (pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:container_memory_rss{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h]))
sum by (pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:container_memory_cache{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h]))

sum by (workload) (max by (namespace, pod, container, workload) (last_over_time(container_memory_swap{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace", container!=""}[1h]) * on (namespace, pod) group_left(workload) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{workload=~"$app"}))
kube_pod_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", phase="Running"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left(workload) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}
count by(namespace, pod, workload) (last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h]))
kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left(workload) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}
sum by (pod, workload) (8 * last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:container_network_receive_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h]))
sum by (pod, workload) (8 * last_over_time(namespace_workload_pod_container:container_network_transmit_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}[1h]))

sum by (pod, workload) (max by (namespace, pod, workload) (last_over_time(rate(container_network_receive_packets_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])[10m:]) * on (namespace, pod) group_left(workload) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{workload=~"$app"}))

kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"} * on(namespace, pod) group_left(workload) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$app"}

title: App별 메트릭
